data.text: @mimislamb1 In our platform, cleaning fees and security deposits are different. Damages are covered by security deposit and cleaning fees are meant for cleaning only. More information on how we handle security deposits here: https://t.co/C6wtJrTXmt. Let us know if you need anything else.

@AirbnbHelp I hear it’s a combination of cleaning and a damage protection fee. Apartments and landlords even refund these fees when there isn’t damage! This needs to be refundable! I need legal advice! #law #lawyer @KimKardashian @taylorswift13 @NBCNews @MSNBC

@mimislamb1 Hi Ivan, we're sorry to hear about this, and we appreciate your honest feedback. Your input will serve as a valuable tool in the evaluation and enhancement of the products and services. And you can always send us any feedback here: https://t.co/mCeclXBYcX. Thank you very much.
